channel.title: Vista VS XP
channel.description: Okay, well i'm about done coding and ready to host my source, I have An xp desktop, and a Vista laptop, so my Desktop is REALLY, slow, and my vista is REALLY fast. but people say vista is no good for hosting ... Can anyone tell me what i should do? :\ I want to atleast hold 50 people.

item.title: Vista VS XP
item.dc:creator: @X-Coder X-Coder
item.description:
@X-Coder wrote:

I would use ur xp desktop for the server anjd use your labtop for ur game and stuff

Read full topic

item.title: Vista VS XP
item.dc:creator: @lov3_rs_money lov3_rs_money
item.description:
@lov3_rs_money wrote:

noob5life:

Okay, well i’m about done coding and ready to host my source, I have An xp desktop, and a Vista laptop, so my Desktop is REALLY, slow, and my vista is REALLY fast. but people say vista is no good for hosting … Can anyone tell me what i should do? :\ I want to atleast hold 50 people.

Depends how much RAM u got, i had a Xp with 2k Ram, it was… ok, but i got vista, its like twice as fast, no lagg at all…

Read full topic

item.title: Vista VS XP
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

its not the fact that vista is so big that it makes you lag, its that vista is so graphically intesive to your computer that it takes anything up to 72% fo your CPU usage jsut to run the interfaces! so yes, it is advisable to blank your HDD of your laptop and install XP pro.

Read full topic

item.title: Vista VS XP
item.dc:creator: @maffiaest maffiaest
item.description:
@maffiaest wrote:

Noob delete ur Vista at Laptop and add Xp Proffesional to it . Then ur server can hold more than 50 pples without lagg + u can be at youtube , msn etc… Vista is just so big and it laggs computer hisself lol .

Read full topic

item.title: Vista VS XP
item.dc:creator: @noob5life noob5life
item.description:
@noob5life wrote:

Mmkay, but you know what, when i host on my vista, and use my desktop to play, for some reason other people cant get on when i do that.

Read full topic

item.title: Vista VS XP
item.dc:creator: @H20wnage H20wnage
item.description:
@H20wnage wrote:

also the hard ware and mem condition of ur computer is maybe a hella lot better but other than that i cant help just say this for the desktop try turning off all programs u dont need.

Read full topic

item.title: Vista VS XP
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

I hosted about 50 people everyday for 4 months with no lag on vista, but it laggs when I was on the computer, talking on Msn, Watching youtube, etc

Read full topic
